name: COPILOT: DARK SPELLWARE
description:
On a full moon night you awake to a ruckus. It has finally happened; the AI, Github Copilot, has started its attack on the humans with one goal in mind... to kill all software developers. The once beloved tool to ease with developing software has now begun to write its own code by its own free will.

Controls:

WADS to Move

F to Switch Weapons

V to Toggle Mute

Mouse to Look

Mouse Button 1 to Shoot

Github Copilot for reference: https://copilot.github.com/

Written in Vanilla Javascript. Checkout the source on our github: https://github.com/HeapOverfl0w/LospecGameJam1

Music by @White Bat Audio on youtube, check him out: https://www.youtube.com/channel/UC_6hQy4elsyHhCOskZo0U5g
